title: why i'm here by Cuson
author: Cuson
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: why i'm here by Cuson
text:
Cover Art
why i'm here
As a professional visualizer in advertising for over a decade, Cuson has had many great achievements in both digital and hand drawing. Twisted, comical, and sometimes haunting figures appear in almost all of his drawings. His greatest satisfaction is drawing freely in his leisure time and exercising his infinite passion for his art.
